entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early this evening. Blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 14 with temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 14 with temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
